page.title: 11Warmington Village #3
page.content: {4.The Village Hall}used by the Womens Institute and Table Tennis Clubs,brings some youthful activitity into this otherwise quite elderly community.{ {5.The Manor House},dominating the Green and without a"Lord"since 1926.{ {6.The Grange},being the venue each year for the Warmington Ball, held in a marquee in the grounds and being the haunt of the local County set. Many current celebrities of radio and television,are able to escape here to live in the tranquility of this delightful village. The population is more elderly having been keen to avoid village growth and development ,unlike adjacent villages.The population is some 200 people and has been for stable for several decades.
